name: Taigua
description:
This is a gameplay test for a game I'm working on called Taigua. It is a 2D sidescroller in nature that features bullethell mechanics and an interactive story. This is just a quick demo of the fighting mechanics only. There are 5 stages: 4 normal stages, and a boss battle. Good luck and have fun!

P.S. this prototype was designed to be played in fullscreen mode.

P.P.S. a game controller is highly recommended, but a mouse is doable.
